index.description: Engage in a collaborative mapping of urban problems

status.analysis: This problem is under analysis by the municipalities
status.inProgress: This problem is being resolved by the municipalities
status.solved: This problem was resolved by the municipalities

emailStep.title: E-mail
emailStep.description: Check if your municipality is registered on Vizo using your institutional e-mail.
emailStep.label: E-mail

toast.title: Not found
toast.description: We couldn't find any municipality associated with this domain.

municipalityCard.title: We encountered the municipality below.
municipalityCard.description: Confirm if you are associated with this municipality.

verifyStep.title: Verify your e-mail
verifyStep.description: We sent a verification code to { email }. Copy and paste it below.
verifyStep.label: Verification code

detailsStep.title: Personal information
detailsStep.description: E-mail verified! Now fill out the form with your personal information.

verification.name: Please enter your name
verification.minAge: You must be at least { age } years old

login.title: Log in to your account
login.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up { citizen } or { official }.

reportProblem.title: Report a problem
reportProblem.maximumImages: You can upload a maximum of 5 images.
reportProblem.imageSize: Each image must have at most

error.timeout: Could not obtain your geolocation, try again later.

localization.currentDescription: Use my current location for reporting.
localization.pointDescription: Point on map the coordinates of the problem.

reportProblem.geolocationAccuracyWarning: About { accuracy } meters away of your actual position. Calculating position more accurately....
reportProblem.markerOutOfBounds: Marker outside the permitted limits of { radius } meters.

validation.maxImages: You can upload a maximum of 5 images
validation.imageSize: Each image must have at most { size } mb

conflictModal.title: You probably already reported this problem
conflictModal.description: You reported a problem within {meters} meters in the last {weeks} weeks. Are you sure you want to report this problem again?

imprecisionModal.title: Your location is imprecise
imprecisionModal.description: We couldn't track your position precisely, so your report will have less credibility. Are you sure you want to send this report?

description.403: You don't have permission for this action.
description.409: This record probably already exists in the database.
description.500: Server error. Please try again later
description.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
